edu.cnm.deepdive.java_learn.model.entity

Class HighlightAnswer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.java_learn.model.entity.HighlightAnswer

  • public class HighlightAnswer
extends Object
    This is the entity class that creates a HighlightAnswer object. Each HighlightAnswer object is associated with one HighlightQuestion entity.
